resources.string: Fitness Tips
Day %d
Bicep Curls
Tricep Extension
Barbell Squats
Lat Pulldowns
Incline Dumbell Press
Seated Cable Rows
Lat Pullover
Hammer Curls
Leg Extension
Shoulder Press
Lat Raises
Face Pulls
Pull Ups
Tricep dips
Preacher Curls
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold dumbbells with palms forward. Curl dumbbells towards shoulders, squeeze biceps, lower slowly. Repeat for desired reps.
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold dumbbell with both hands. Raise it above head, lower it behind head by bending elbows. Extend arms upward, repeat for desired reps.
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, place barbell on upper back. Bend knees, lower into squat position. Keep back straight, push through heels to stand up. Repeat for desired reps.
Sit at a lat pulldown machine, grasp the bar with hands wider than shoulder-width apart. Pull the bar down towards chest, squeezing back muscles. Slowly release and repeat for desired reps.
Lie on an incline bench, hold dumbbells at shoulder level. Press them upward until arms are extended. Lower with control, keeping elbows slightly bent. Repeat for desired reps.
Sit at a cable row machine with feet on the footrests. Grab the handles with arms extended. Pull handles toward torso, squeezing shoulder blades. Release and repeat for desired reps.

Lie on a bench, hold a dumbbell above your chest with both hands. Lower it backward over your head, maintaining a slight bend in your elbows. Pull it back up to the starting position. Repeat for desired reps.
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold dumbbells with palms facing your body. Keep elbows close to your sides, curl dumbbells upward. Lower and repeat for desired reps.
Sit on a leg extension machine, adjust the pad to rest against your lower shins. Extend your legs forward, lifting the weight. Slowly lower to starting position. Repeat for desired reps.
Stand or sit with dumbbells in hand at shoulder level. Press the weights upward, extending arms fully. Lower them back down to shoulder level. Repeat for desired reps.
Stand with dumbbells in hand, palms facing inward. Raise your arms to the sides until they are parallel to the floor. Lower them back down. Repeat for desired reps.

Attach a rope or handle to a cable machine at chest height. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, grab the handles, and pull them towards your face, keeping elbows high and out to the sides. Squeeze your shoulder blades together. Slowly release and repeat for desired reps.
Hang from a pull-up bar with palms facing away. Pull your body up until your chin clears the bar. Lower yourself down with control. Repeat for desired reps.

Sit on the edge of a bench or chair, place your hands on the edge beside you, fingers forward. Slide your hips off the bench, bend elbows to lower your body, then push back up. Repeat for desired reps.

Sit at a preacher curl bench, place upper arms on the angled pad, hold a barbell with an underhand grip. Curl the barbell upward, contracting your biceps. Lower it back down with control. Repeat for desired reps.
